alert.note: Alert for Calhoun; Gadsden; Jackson (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued January 12 at 7:37PM EST until January 12 at 8:15PM EST by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Jackson County in the Panhandle of Florida... Northeastern Calhoun County in the Panhandle of Florida... Northwestern Gadsden County in Big Bend of Florida... Southwestern Decatur County in southwestern Georgia... Southeastern Seminole County in southwestern Georgia... * Until 815 PM EST/715 PM CST/. * At 737 PM EST/637 PM CST/, a severe thunderstorm was located 13 miles northwest of Blountstown, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Quincy, Chattahoochee, Greensboro, Sneads, Gretna, Grand Ridge, Altha, Littman, Ocheesee, Douglas City, Rosedale, Recovery, Union City, Henderson Mill, Jinks, Quincy Airport, Alliance, Mount Pleasant, Hardin Heights and Hardaway. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 900 PM EST/800 PM CST/ for the Panhandle of Florida...and southwestern Georgia. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 900 PM EST/800 PM CST/ for the Panhandle of Florida...and southwestern Georgia.
